Name: Limey Cosmo
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: As the name suggests, a more lime-forward flavoured Cosmopolitan while remaining balanced rather than overly sour.
History: Created in the early 2000s by yours truly. See: Cosmopolitan cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Limey Cosmo contains 86 calories
